grass.name: Grassland
grass.description: Fertile grassland, ideal for agriculture and livestock. Suitable for most buildings.

water.name: Water
water.description: Clear freshwater. Impassable for land vehicles, but ideal for shipping and fishing.

mountain.name: Mountain
mountain.description: Steep mountain slopes with valuable minerals. Only suitable for mines and special buildings.

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: Dense forest with valuable timber resources. Suitable for sawmills and forestry.

farmland.name: Farmland
farmland.description: Fertile farmland, perfect for growing crops and other agricultural products.

desert.name: Desert
desert.description: Dry desert landscape with little vegetation. Difficult conditions for construction and agriculture.

hills.name: Hills
hills.description: Gentle hills with moderate slopes. Suitable for livestock and smaller buildings.

beach.name: Beach
beach.description: Sandy beach by the water. Ideal for ports and recreational facilities.

deepwater.name: Deep Water
deepwater.description: Deep waters for large ships. Impassable for land vehicles.

dirt.name: Dirt
dirt.description: Bare earth without vegetation. Cheap to build on, but not very fertile.

rail.name: Railway
rail.description: Railway tracks for train traffic. Enables fast transport of goods.

road.name: Road
road.description: Paved road for vehicles. Connects cities and industrial areas.
